```{r}
library(RJSONIO)
library(readr)
```


```{r}
json <- read_file("scpd_incidents.txt")
file <- fromJSON(json)

json_file <- lapply(file, function(x) {
  x[sapply(x, is.null)] <- NA
  unlist(x)})

json_data <- fromJSON(json_file, nullValue = NA)
asFrame <- do.call("rbind.fill", lapply(json_data, as.data.frame))
```
